value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Commander Anna! Brother! What
has taken you so long to get to
the World of Mystery?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Sorry, Sharena. We had to battle
our way here.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Who's this with you? Oh my!
You're holding the divine relic...
and it's all aglow!$k$p$EFace_Smile2|Are you...the Great Hero? Our group
has hoped beyond hope that you
might come to save us!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Please, calm yourself, Sharena.
This is $Nu.$k$pAs it turns out, the Great Hero is a
talented tactician as well. We're
already in good hands.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|But...that's amazing. And, Great Hero,
you're as great as I imagined. I'm
going to be your number-one fan.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|Oh! My manners have gone right out
the window. I'm Sharena, Alfonse's
darling little sister.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|All right, all right... Just tell us, what's
the situation here?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Simply put? Absolutely dreadful. The
empire has taken control of a Hero
from the World of Mystery.$k$pShe swoops through the skies, a
fearsome figure, all in red.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|A red flier from Mystery? It sounds
like Princess Minerva.$k$p$EFace_Anger|This battle will be tough. We should
bring a Hero who's an archer, or
perhaps...$k

$WmMPID_ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Begone, outsiders! I am Minerva,
Princess of Macedon. Now, I'll warn
you once—return to your world.$k$pI am bound to serve the Emblian
Empire, and the imperial princess,
Veronica, has given me an order.$k$pShe has commanded that I attack
a kingdom near her empire. I have
no time for the likes of you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Princess Minerva, please hear me out.
My name is Prince Alfonse, of the
very kingdom you plan to attack.$k$pI beg you, put down your weapons.
We of Askr have no desire to
battle you noble Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I am under contract to obey Princess
Veronica. There is only ONE way to
release me. Prove you are stronger.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Must we resolve this with a battle,
Princess Minerva?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Prince Alfonse! She has named her
terms. We must fight—and win!$k$pEveryone, prepare for battle!$k$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|$SspVOICE_TUTORIAL_B|You can destroy some walls,
$Nu.$k

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|$SspVOICE_TUTORIAL_C|Fliers are weak to arrows. Archers
can prove useful against them.$k

Attack a crumbling wall to
destroy it.

Fire an arrow at a flying unit to
take it down more quickly.

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well done, Prince Alfonse. You have
proved strong enough to break
our contract with Veronica.$k$pAnd so, we are free once more.
I give you my oath that we will not
attack your kingdom. Farewell.$k

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That completes this mission,
$Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|You're such an excellent tactician.
Why, I think I'm going to be very
fond of you.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Everyone, listen up. I've just gotten
a report that Emblian soldiers are
advancing on our kingdom!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What? Then all of this, here—?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It was just a distraction. We've left
our kingdom open to attack.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What's done is done. Now, let's
make haste. Back to Askr!$k$Sbs150|
